abstract.t: This document presents the framework and key methods for Large-scale Deterministic Networks (LDN). It achieves scalability for the number of supportable deterministic traffic flows via Scalable Deterministic Forwarding (SDF) that does not require per-flow state in transit nodes and precise time synchronization among nodes. It achieves Scalable Resource Reservation (SRR) by allowing for it to be decoupled from the forwarding plane nodes, and aggregating resource reservation status in time slots.
